org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.auth

Class BasicCredentialsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.auth.BasicCredentialsProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialsProvider, CredentialsStore

    @Contract(threading=SAFE)
public class BasicCredentialsProvider
extends Object
implements CredentialsStore
    Default implementation of CredentialsStore.

    4.0

    • Method Detail

      • setCredentials

        public void setCredentials(AuthScope authScope,
                  Credentials credentials)
        Description copied from interface: CredentialsStore
        Sets the credentials for the given authentication scope. Any previous credentials for the given scope will be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        setCredentials in interface CredentialsStore
        Parameters:
        authScope - the authentication scope
        credentials - the authentication credentials for the given scope.
        See Also:
        CredentialsProvider.getCredentials(AuthScope, org.apache.hc.core5.http.protocol.HttpContext)
